questions.text: Which two students did Sally Jones live with?
questions.explanation:
Sid and Tommy.

	Sally Jones lived as a border with the O'Brien family.

questions.text: Which of the following characters was NOT portrayed by one of the kidnappers?
questions.explanation:
Marty the Moose.

	The four men wore masks that represented beloved characters in Australia so that the children could not identify them.  The other character that was worn by a kidnapper was Pussy Cat.

questions.text: Which of the child was sent to find help when the kidnappers stopped so that the children could go to the bathroom?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Miss Jones told Tommy to run for help.  When all of the children got back in the van and began to sing a song, Sarah pointed out that Sid had sang Tommy's line.  They went back and Miss Jones found Tommy so that the kidnappers wouldn't hurt Toby.

questions.text: Where did the kidnappers put the children to hide them?
questions.explanation:
Cave.

	Miss Jones and her students were put down in a cave and then the kidnappers covered the entrance with a big rock.  Miss Jones and Sid went onto explore the cave and find a way out.

questions.text: During their escape which child became nervous and caused Miss Jones to bump her head on a rock and become disoriented?
questions.explanation:
Sarah.

	Miss Jones and Sid found a way out of the cave which meant that all of the children would have to swim under a rock to get out.  Sarah got scared and Sid came along and got Sarah to safety and came back and rescued Miss Jones.

questions.text: Miss Jones told the children that she would treat them to a hamburger at Kubarra after they were rescued.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Miss Jones was trying to keep their spirits up and give them something to look forward to rather than focusing on the danger that they were involved in.

questions.text: What kind of alcohol was all that the old man said he had available in the house?
questions.explanation:
Sherry.

	The kidnappers had invaded the home of an elderly couple in the Outback.  Miss Jones and the children thought that they were going to be safe when they showed up at the doorstep of home, but were once again back in the grasp of the kidnappers.

questions.text: Who was the first kidnapper to get killed by the other kidnappers?
questions.explanation:
Dabby Duck.

	Dabby Duck was killed and hung up on a post.  Miss Jones discovered him when they were on the run from the barn.

questions.text: Which child accidentally got shot in the barn?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Sid had a plan to overtake the kidnapper whom was left to watch them.  When they hit Pussy Cat over the head his gun accidentally went off and shot Tommy in the shoulder.

questions.text: Miss Jones and the children killed Father Christmas in the end and put his heart in a jar in their classroom.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Miss Jones and the children hid once again in a cave and made several weapons out of their school supplies.  They lured Father Christmas into the cave and in a rage killed him.
